entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
